title: SIGSEGV - mrb_vm_exec - vm.c in line:1272
vulnerability_information:
PoC:
-------------------

The following code triggers the bug (attached as test_mrb_vm_exec_1272.rb):
	
	a,a,a,a=0,def e
	end
	a[]

Sandbox:
-------------------

	x@x:~/Desktop/research/mruby-engine/bin$ ./sandbox test_mrb_vm_exec_1272.rb

activities.message:
Thank you for reporting this bug! This is an automated response to let you know that we've received your issue, and we'll process it as soon as possible.

Due to the holiday period and the large volume of reports we have received, it may take us up to three weeks to respond. Thank you for your patience!
Thank you for your report. We've reproduced the issue and opened an issue upstream: https://github.com/mruby/mruby/issues/3390

Thanks again for your report. This issue has been addressed upstream in https://github.com/mruby/mruby/pull/3402.

Our next round of bounty decisions will take place within two weeks, so we will be in touch with you again soon.
Thanks for helping improve the security of Mruby and Shopify Scripts!
